org.opentcs.components.plantoverview

接口 VehicleTheme


  • public interface VehicleTheme
    Provides a vehicle theme.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default java.awt.Image getImageFor(Vehicle vehicle)
      已过时。 
      Use statefulImage(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle) or statelessImage(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle) instead.
      default java.lang.String getName()
      已过时。 
      Unused. Will be removed.
      default java.awt.Image getThemeImage()
      已过时。 
      default java.lang.String label(Vehicle vehicle)
      Provides a label that describes this vehicle.
      default java.awt.Color labelColor()
      Provides the color to be used for drawing the label.
      default java.awt.Font labelFont()
      Provides the font to be used for drawing the label.
      default int labelOffsetX()
      Provides the vertical offset of the label relative to the center of the vehicle figure.
      default int labelOffsetY()
      Provides the vertical offset of the label relative to the center of the vehicle figure.
      default java.awt.Image statefulImage(Vehicle vehicle)
      Returns an image for the given vehicle, representing its current state.
      default java.awt.Image statelessImage(Vehicle vehicle)
      Returns an image for the given vehicle, disregarding its current state.

    • 方法详细资料

      • statelessImage

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default java.awt.Image statelessImage(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                                             Vehicle vehicle)
        Returns an image for the given vehicle, disregarding its current state.
        参数:
        vehicle - The vehicle for which to return the image.
        返回:
        An image for the given vehicle.

      • statefulImage

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default java.awt.Image statefulImage(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                                            Vehicle vehicle)
        Returns an image for the given vehicle, representing its current state.
        参数:
        vehicle - The vehicle for which to return the image.
        返回:
        An image for the given vehicle.

      • getThemeImage

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
default java.awt.Image getThemeImage()
        已过时。 
        Returns an image representing this theme, usually an image of the vehicle in its normal state.
        返回:
        A default image for this theme.

      • getImageFor

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
default java.awt.Image getImageFor(Vehicle vehicle)
        已过时。 Use statefulImage(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle) or statelessImage(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle) instead.
        Returns an image for the given vehicle, representing its current state.
        参数:
        vehicle - The vehicle for which to return the image.
        返回:
        An image for the given vehicle.

      • getName

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
default java.lang.String getName()
        已过时。 Unused. Will be removed.
        Returns a name/short description of this theme.
        返回:
        A name/short description of this theme.

      • label

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default java.lang.String label(Vehicle vehicle)
        Provides a label that describes this vehicle. Usually this is the name of the vehicle or an abbreviation.
        参数:
        vehicle - The vehicle to provide a label for.
        返回:
        A label that describes the given vehicle.

      • labelOffsetX

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default int labelOffsetX()
        Provides the vertical offset of the label relative to the center of the vehicle figure.
        返回:
        The horizontal offset.

      • labelOffsetY

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default int labelOffsetY()
        Provides the vertical offset of the label relative to the center of the vehicle figure.
        返回:
        The vertical offset.

      • labelColor

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default java.awt.Color labelColor()
        Provides the color to be used for drawing the label.
        返回:
        The color to be used for drawing the label.

      • labelFont

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default java.awt.Font labelFont()
        Provides the font to be used for drawing the label.
        返回:
        The font to be used for drawing the label.
